Requirement: A weapon with the Loading trait.

You focus your eyes on your target from behind your readied weapon, zeroing in on your opponent's weak points and calculating the distance, gravity, and air resistance of your soon-to-hit next shot.

Pros

Reliable Aim

  • You do not have disadvantage on attacks at any range, or from being @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.RK3DF56CKMQUV6DM]{Prone}.
Snipe
  • You do not exit Loading Stance while prone. In addition, your attacks have a +5 to hit targets 15ft or further away while @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.RK3DF56CKMQUV6DM]{Prone}.
Precision Pierce
  • If you attack a target that has been attacked since your last turn and the attack hits, the creature must make a Constitution (Save) check of DC 10 + Your Attack Modifier or start @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.R54LQEKSDXNQ3N75]{Bleeding}. The creature can cure this by making an Intelligence (Medicine) check on itself of the same DC as an action.

Cons

Malfunction

  • On a critically failed weapon attack, Strength (Save) check, or Dexterity (Save) check, your weapon gets jammed, becoming unusable. You can attempt to unjam the weapon as a minor action by beating a DC 10 Intelligence (Craft) check.
Risk of Casualty
  • If your target is aware of you and within 5ft of another creature of equal or larger size, then you have a -2 to attack rolls to hit the target.
